newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Buba's Meister downplays Waigel comments on EMU.
newsitem.headline: Buba's Meister downplays Waigel comments on EMU.

text.p: Bundesbank board member Edgar Meister on Monday played down comments by German Finance Minister Theo Waigel that stoked speculation about a potential delay to Europe's single currency.
"What Waigel said is not new. There are no new facts or figures so I don't know why the markets seem to be nervous," Meister told reporters during a visit to Vienna.

Waigel told Germany's Bild newspaper that meeting the economic targets for membership of a single currency took precedence over the timetable. German opposition leaders say that Germany has no hope of qualifying on time. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12257
